    • Constructor Detail

      • Cell

        public Cell(int posHorizontal,
    int posVertical,
    char pieceName,
    Piece.color pieceColor)
        creates a cell with a position, color, and piece (if applicable)
        Parameters:
        posHorizontal - column number (0 to 7)
        posVertical - row number (0 to 7)
        pieceName - name of the piece in the cell (' ' for empty cell)
        pieceColor - color of the piece in the cell. If the cell is empty, it's irrelevant

    • Method Detail

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Returns:
        true if the cell is empty (no piece inside)

      • showColor

        public Cell.ccolor showColor()
        Returns:
        color of the cell (white or black)

      • getPiece

        public Piece getPiece()
        Returns:
        piece inside the cell (or null, if the cell is empty)

      • showPiecePossibleMoves

        public int[][] showPiecePossibleMoves()
        Returns:
        moves that the piece inside the cell can make (all moves)

      • showPieceName

        public char showPieceName()
        Returns:
        name of the piece inside the cell

      • showPosition

        public int[] showPosition()
        Returns:
        position of the cell

      • showPieceColor

        public Piece.color showPieceColor()
        Returns:
        color of the piece inside the cell (or null, if the cell is empty)

      • moveOutPiece

        public void moveOutPiece()
        removes the piece from the cell

      • moveInPiece

        public void moveInPiece(Piece piece)
        puts a piece in the cell
        Parameters:
        piece - piece to move into the cell
